title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.3 - Recording and internal distribution of official releases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.3 - Recording and internal distribution of official releases

State Regulations

Each social services district shall: (a) maintain a record of official releases
received from the department; (b) distribute copies of such releases to appropriate staff members; (c) maintain for examination on regular
workdays during regular office hours by individuals, upon request for review, study or reproduction by an individual or organization, copies of such program
manuals and other policy issuances which affect the public, including the
department's rules and regulations governing eligibility; need, and amount of
assistance; recipients rights and responsibilities; and services offered by the
agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
300.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
